pullrequest.title: Update windows build scripts for gazebo11

content.raw: I run a test build of gazebo9 on cmake 3.13 on the Windows.mad Jenkins node. The thing compiles so I think there is something in cmake 3.15 that is triggering the problem with the pkg-config error.  [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/\_test\_winmad2\_gazebo-ci-gazebo10-windows7-amd64/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_test_winmad2_gazebo-ci-gazebo10-windows7-amd64/)
